summary: Iteration 11 - Autonomous Collector & Dashboard Quick Actions Testing: All features working correctly. Backend APIs (8/8 tests passed) and Frontend UI fully functional.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Autonomous Collector module fully functional with Debtor Segmentation (GOLD/SILVER/BRONZE/BLOCKED), Emergency Controls (Nuke Button), Payment Reminders, and Collection Analytics. Dashboard Quick Actions widget shows 6 quick links and Director Command Center button.

dashboard_quick_actions_widget.details: Quick Actions widget displays with 6 quick links: Add Lead, Create Quotation, New Invoice, Run Report, Custom Fields, AI Dashboard

director_command_center_button.details: Director Command Center button present in System Health card on Dashboard

autonomous_collector_page_load.details: Page loads with title 'Autonomous Collector' and Zap icon

debtor_segmentation_tabs.details: All 4 segments displayed: GOLD Customers (score 80-100), SILVER Customers (score 50-79), BRONZE Customers (score 20-49), BLOCKED Customers (auto-blocked)

emergency_controls_dialog.details: Emergency Controls button opens dialog with Action Types (Halt Production, Freeze New Orders, Block Shipping, Full Lockdown), Scope selector, Reason field, Duration field

payment_reminders_tab.details: Payment Reminders tab shows pending reminders or 'All payments are on track' message

collection_analytics_tab.details: Collection Analytics tab shows Collection Summary (Total Invoiced, Total Collected, Pending Collection, Payment Count) and Performance Metrics (Collection Efficiency, Avg Collection Days)

sidebar_collector_link.details: Navigation sidebar has 'Collector' link with Zap icon
